kiroAgent.trustedCommands: $content = Get-Content "src/app/seo/page.tsx" -Raw; $lines = $content -split "`n"; Write-Host "Total lines: $($lines.Count)"; Write-Host "Last 5 lines:"; $lines[-5..-1] | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_ }
Write-Output "SEO Management - All errors fixed and UI enhanced successfully!"
